page.title: 11HEALTH FARM
page.content: A TYPICAL DIET BASED ON HIGH FIBRE/LOW CALORIE FROM THE HEALTH FARM. BREAKFAST -{half grapefruit { } -{weetabix}&{bran tea or { coffee } MID-MORNING -{1 orange divided up { taken with tea or coffee LUNCH 1 -{batchelor slim-a-soup {& 2 krispen OR 2 -{1 egg & tomatoe & 2 {krispen OR 3 -{1 banana & 2 krispen OR 4 -{baked beans & 2 krispen AFTERNOON -{sliced apple,pear,etc EVENING 1 -{1 salad with cottage {cheese or ham OR 2 -{chicken/fish/liver/ } {baked beans with plenty {of vegetables+1 potato SUPPER -{bran ceral or sliced {fruit+tea or coffee {NO SUGAR,BUTTER,FAT OR SALT}!
